misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The use of the DES encryption algorithm, which is considered to be insecure and broken, as it uses a 56-bit key and can be easily brute-forced. It is recommended to use a more secure and modern encryption algorithm, such as AES.
recommendation: Use a more secure and modern encryption algorithm, such as AES.
